description:
The main goal of this project is to create an intuitive GUI for the most common CLI package managers for Windows 10 and Windows 11, such as Winget, Scoop, Chocolatey, npm, pip, .NET Tool and PowerShell Gallery.
With this app, you'll be able to easily download, install, update and uninstall any software that's published on the supported package managers — and so much more.
summary: WingetUI: A better UI for your package managers
author: Martí Climent
